overview:
Stephen handles marketing and logistics for the tech startup, Loffles.

Stephen is a young entrepreneur from Philadelphia, Pennsylvania currently living and working in Providence, Rhode Island. He recently took time off from his studies at Penn State Schreyer Honors College to work full-time on the startup, Loffles. Stephen was heavily involved in writing the business plan and fundraising for Loffles, and now manages marketing and logistics for the company.
